lead_paragraph: Top-seeded Richard Gasquet swept aside his fellow Frenchman Fabrice Santoro yesterday, 6-0, 6-3, to set up a final against eighth-seeded Olivier Rochus at the Mumbai Open. Gasquet backed a ferocious serve with thundering one-handed backhands to dismantle Santoro in 58 minutes. Rochus defeated Rainer Schüttler, 6-4, 6-4, in the other semifinal.
